title: Engineering Practical Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Virtual Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A socially constructivist educational environment where practicing professionals collaborate on design projects in virtual settings, using personal devices to access VR/simulation platforms for peer observation and feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more engineering design projects using collaborative tools in a virtual design studio.
Learners can observe and analyze (listening-in) peers' design work and apply two or more improvements to their own design process.
Learners can communicate in real-time with peers and instructors via online feedback mechanisms and correct over 80% of design errors.
Learners can develop five or more creative problem-solving strategies through social comparison and community-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
